recipesJson.name: strawberry puddin
recipesJson.author: jpsublime921
recipesJson.description: A nice light vanilla pudding with sweet sugary strawberries . FLV pudding is great and does not take over the recipe. VC1 I added for some more body. Graham Cracker to give a little something extra on the end. And of course Juicy Strawberry because i just got this stuff and it is bangin. I wanted the Strawberry to be prominent and added some Sisha Strawberry to help the Juicy out. Dropped percentages from the original on juicy strawberry and pudding. I felt they were being muted after a steep.

reviews.text: This is a nice, thick strawberry that really shows what flv vanilla pudding can do, and I'm always glad to see juicy strawberry getting some love
